revision.text: '''Regions''' are areas in the world of Pokémon. Each new region introduces a new set of [[Route Statistics|routes]], [[Towns & Cities|towns]], [[Gyms|gyms]] and [[Obtainable Pokémon|Pokémon]]. Pokémon that are not native to a region get a damage debuff, but with each new region entered, this debuff decreases by 10%. Furthermore, some region offer unique gameplay elements.
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
